testcase.name: Verify user login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the innait application.............................passed Then User verify the client logo is present on the header...................passed Then User verify the application logo is present on the header..............passed Then User verify the fingerprint text message...............................passed Then User verify the precision logo is present on the footer................passed Then User click on the key icon.............................................passed Then User verify the precision logo is present on the header................passed Then User verify the innait logo is present on the header...................passed Then User verify the Login page header matches - Employee Id................passed When User enter the employeeid address......................................passed Then User verify the Login page header matches - InnaIT Password............passed And User enter the InnaIT Password..........................................passed And User click on the login button..........................................passed
